short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blacklist subreddits from appearing in Popular.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to list all subreddits you no longer want to see when browsing r/Popular. You can add items by typing in the non-case-sensitive text field and hitting "add". To remove a subreddit from the list, simply click on the item you would like to remove. Happy browsing!
